attributes.action: fund the RNLI from public money, it should not be up to voluntary contributions to keep the lifeboats afloat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in this day and age, the lifeboats wich save lifes around our coasts, should be funded from public money, it should not be up to members of the public, to fund this vital service voluntarily

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
